subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon/Frank's Box on YouTube
author: Lisby
full_text:
Phew. I was afraid for a minute that you were an adherent of that  
remote viewer who says that he's seen that that we're all an here  
because the aliens are growing us for our souls.

Ann

On Dec 31, 2007, at 9:39 PM, Zack Widup wrote:

>
> I didn't intend for either to be ominous. I just think we don't  
> know who
> we're really comunicating with through the boxes. It could be space
> aliens for all we know. They definitely don't sound like the EVP's  
> I've
> gotten in haunted places. They are in a class by themselves. Maybe  
> we'll
> know for sure some day.
>
> As for the loved ones, I personally think they hang around for the
> funeral, then they're off into a new baby body as fast as they can  
> go. The
> ones who hang around and become ghosts are probably in the less  
> than 1%
> category of people who do that. The rest are growing up with new  
> parents
> somewhere and getting to believe in Santa Claus (or whatever) again.
> :-)
>
> Zack
>
> On Mon, 31 Dec 2007, Lisby wrote:
>
> > Perhaps I should have been more specific.
> >
> > Ominous--in reference to the people speaking through the box not  
> being our
> > loved ones who are "somewhere else."
> >
> >
> > On Dec 31, 2007, at 7:38 PM, Ken wrote:
> >
> >>
> >> Ominous? It depends on which side of the fence your on? I have  
> been in a
> >> position
> >> of asking for Angels / Gods protection after sensing what was  
> perceived as
> >> evil.
> >> Good and evil / Light & darkness can not exist in the same  
> space. You can't
> >> have
> >> one without the other. Negativity will always be overpowered by  
> Good &
> >> darkness
> >> will always be illuminated by the light. Negative entities will  
> try to lie
> >> and / or mislead?
> >> You can't always know who your dealing with, but that's part of the
> >> investigating process,
> >> isn't it? Asking & Trying to determine who your dealing with?
> >>
> >> ----- Original Message -----
> >> From: Lisby
> >> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> >> Sent: Monday, December 31, 2007 3:53 PM
> >> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon/Frank's Box on YouTube
> >>
> >> That sounds quite ominous, Zack. Not sure I like the sound of  
> it. What is
> >> your theory?
> >>
> >>
> >> Ann
> >>
> >> On Dec 31, 2007, at 2:21 PM, Zack Widup wrote:
> >>
> >>>
> >>> We actually don't know who we're communicating with using the  
> boxes. I
> >>> suspect it isn't what we traditionally call a "ghost".
> >>>
> >>> I also suspect that people are not hearing their loved ones.  
> The loved
> >>> oneshave probably been elsewhere for some time ...
> >>>
> >>> Zack
> >>>
> >>> On Mon, 31 Dec 2007, immortallic2 wrote:
> >>>
> >>>> I personally have seen Chris use his box in public forum four  
> times.
> >>>> I have heard the box give audible yes and no type answers to  
> peoples
> >>>> questions. I do feel though that the ones that get emotionally  
> moved
> >>>> the most are the ones wanting with all their heart to hear from a
> >>>> loved one. When these people get an answer that may or may not be
> >>>> heard by all, they feel that it is indeed from a loved one and it
> >>>> hits them in the heart as if it was real. I would love to hear a
> >>>> recorded session from start to finish as an investigator.  
> After all
> >>>> this research is for all not just "30".... :-)
> >>>>
> >>>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>

> >> Checked by AVG Free Edition.
> >> Version: 7.5.516 / Virus Database: 269.17.13/1205 - Release Date:
> >> 12/31/2007 3:32 PM
> >>
> >>
> >
>
>
